name: YugabyteDB
description: YugabyteDB is a cloud-native distributed PostgreSQL-compatible database that combines strong consistency with ultra-resilience, seamless scalability, geo-distribution, and highly flexible data locality to deliver business-critical, transactional applications.

notes.text: You must set the correct ulimits and enable transparent hugepages on your system: https://docs.yugabyte.com/stable/deploy/manual-deployment/system-config/#set-ulimits
Do not use RAID across multiple disks, ZFS and NFS are not currently supported.
XFS is the recommended filesystem, SSDs (solid state disks) are required.
